title: Decades in Prison for Selling Weed, 5 Years’ Probation for Raping a Child?
subtitle: A widely shared meme compared the crimes and punishments of Michael Alonzo Thompson and Joseph Robert Meili.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Michael Alonzo Thompson was imprisoned for decades for selling marijuana, while Joseph Robert Meili got five years' probation for kidnapping and raping an 11-year-old girl.
